chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Forging of a Hammer
chapters.info: Maighdin Dorlain, p. 171 (195)—Penniless young woman that Perrin encountered who was fleeing Amadicia. She did not reveal her true identity, Morgase Trakand of Andor—she uses her mother's name as a disguise. She became one of Faile's servants, much to her own dismay (being used to commanding the servants, not being one), and was eventually captured by the Shaido and made gai'shain. See also Trakand, Morgase.
